English.Text: Only the able-bodied make it. The interior walls of the castle are smooth and featurelessâ€” it's almost as if they had been designed to keep people in... When the skilled climbers reach the battlements do they realise there is no easy way to help the rest up. "We'll come back for you in the morning," they say. Returning after a damp and sleepless night, they find the portcullis raised yet see no sign of their comrades. A thorough search of the castle is conducted, but the devil place is found to be completely deserted.
